name: Little Ghost (itch) (VladGG Dev)
description:
Description:

In this game you are a little ghost that's going through 5 carefully crafted levels.

The main mechanic is that you can turn into a shadow to pass through walls and floors, just don't fall out of the level. At the end of the game you would have mastered this ability.

The game also encourages playing it more times and discovering faster alternate routes through the levels.

Controls:
  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • M to change the volume
  • R to restart levels
  • P to skip a level
  • O to go back one level
  • SPACE to become a shadow or ghost

Music by  wyver9 over on https://opengameart.org/ (https://opengameart.org/users/wyver9)
